raw_result.Analysis Notes: The search results included both direct links to applying or learning more about free school meals, as well as resources discussing meal eligibility and distribution of supermarket vouchers. The top recommendations were selected based on their relevance, quality of information provided, and clarity in helping users find council customer information regarding free school meals.
